open to running for Eric Holcomb ' Saying "we choose Indiana," U.S. Mike Pence shut the door Thursday on seeking the presidency in 2012 but left unanswered whether his choice instead is the Indiana Eric Holcomb 's office. I'm open to running for Eric Holcomb , Mike Pence said in an exclusive interview with The Indianapolis Star. "We're going to take the next several months to travel across the state and hear what Hoosiers have to say. We'll seriously consider it.
